name: SaveBehavior

properties.description: Never save the item with the file.
properties.name: NEVERSAVE

properties.description: Always save the item with the file.
properties.name: ALWAYSSAVE

properties.description: Prompt the user whether to save the item with the file.
properties.name: ASKWHENSAVING

description: The application's behavior regarding image previews and file extensions when a save method is called.
